Uses of Class
jcuda.runtime.cudaStream_t

  • Packages that use cudaStream_t 
    Package Description
    jcuda.driver
    Contains the classes related to the JCuda driver API.
    jcuda.runtime
    Contains the classes related to the JCuda runtime API.

    • Uses of cudaStream_t in jcuda.driver

      Constructors in jcuda.driver with parameters of type cudaStream_t 
      Constructor and Description
      CUstream(cudaStream_t stream)
      Creates a CUstream for the given cudaStream_t.

    • Uses of cudaStream_t in jcuda.runtime

      Fields in jcuda.runtime declared as cudaStream_t 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static cudaStream_t JCuda.cudaStreamLegacy
      Stream handle that can be passed as a cudaStream_t to use an implicit stream with legacy synchronization behavior.
      static cudaStream_t JCuda.cudaStreamPerThread
      Stream handle that can be passed as a cudaStream_t to use an implicit stream with per-thread synchronization behavior.
